TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ImmutableHashSet extends System.Object

Docs.summary:
Provides a set of initialization methods for instances of the class.
[!INCLUDE[immutable_nuget_short](~/includes/immutable-nuget-short-md.md)]

Docs.summary: Enumerates a sequence and produces an immutable hash set of its contents.
